scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:ropsten: mustache config/ropsten.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:goerli: mustache config/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:mumbai: mustache config/mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npx graph deploy --debug  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  decentraland/mana
scripts.deploy:ropsten: npm run prepare:ropsten && npx graph deploy --debug  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  decentraland/mana-ropsten
scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run prepare:goerli && npx graph deploy --debug  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  decentraland/mana-goerli
scripts.deploy:mumbai: npm run prepare:mumbai && npx graph deploy --node https://graph.decentraland.io --ipfs https://ipfs.infura.io:5001 mana-mumbai -v
